trial_identification.scientifictitle: The effect of motor control exercise versus placebo in patients with chronic low back pain

interventions.interventions: Patients will be randomly assigned to one of 2 groups. Both groups will attend 12 x 1/2 hour sessions of treatment over an 8 week period. Group 1 will receive a motor control exercise program designed to restore control of the trunk muscles.
interventions.comparator: Group 2 will receive a placebo treatment of 20 mins of detuned shortwave diathermy and 5 mins of detuned ultrasound.

primaryOutcome.outcome: Average pain intensity over last week (0-10 scale)
Global perceived effect (Global Perceived Effect Scale)
Patient-generated measure of disability (Patient-Specific Functional Scale)

secondaryOutcome.outcome: (i)Average pain intensity over last week (0-10 scale)
(ii) Global perceived effect (Global Perceived Effect Scale)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Measured at baseline, 6 months and 12 months.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: (iii)Patient- generated measure of disability (Patient-Specific Functional Scale)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Measured at baseline, 6 months and 12 months.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: (iv) Condition-specific measure of disability (Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire)
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Measured at baseline, 6 months and 12 months.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: (i)Non-specific low back pain +/- leg pain of at least 3 months duration (ii)Currently seeking care for low back pain (iii) English speaker (iv)Clinical assessment indicates that the subject is suitable for motor control exercise.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: (i)Suspected or confirmed serious spinal pathology (fracture, metastatic, inflammatory or infective diseases of the spine, cauda equina syndrome/widespread neurological disorder).(ii)Suspected or confirmed pregnancy(iii)Are unable to speak English(iv)Nerve root compromise (2 of strength, reflex or sensation affected for same nerve root)(v)Spinal surgery in the past 12 months.(vi)Scheduled for major surgery during treatment or follow-up period (vii)Any of the contraindications to exercise listed on page 42 of the ACSM guidelines (ACSM's Guidelines for Exercise Testing and Prescription, 1995).(viii)Any contraindication to pulsed ultrasound or pulsed shortwave.

trial_design.sequence: The allocation sequence will be generated using random number function in Excel, blocking will also be used.
